pages.title: Item Filter
pages.text: The Item Filter augment allows a machine, device, or piece of equipment to selectively accept items. The filter can be configured in a separate GUI, accessible by shift right-clicking the block or item it is installed in, or through a tab in the block's GUI.
Up to 15 items can be added to the filter, with options to change between allow/deny list and to match/ignore NBT.
